objects.description: [Sandworm Team](https://collaborate.mitre.org/attackics/index.php/Group/G0007) used valid accounts to laterally move through VPN connections and dual-homed systems.(Citation: Dragos Electrum)(Citation: Dragos CRASHOVERRIDE) In the Ukraine 2015 Incident, Sandworm Team blocked command messages by using malicious firmware to render communication devices inoperable.(Citation: ICS SANS Ukraine March 2018)

external_references.description: Dragos. (2018, October 12). Anatomy of an Attack: Detecting and Defeating CRASHOVERRIDE. Retrieved October 14, 2019.

Electricity Information Sharing and Analysis Center; SANS Industrial Control Systems. (2016, March 18). Analysis of the Cyber Attack on the Ukranian Power Grid: Defense Use Case. Retrieved March 27, 2018.
